[Q] Repeat the following sentence at a fast pace: Hey, how's everything going with you lately? Hope you're doing well and staying healthy. 
[A] Hey, how's everything going with you lately? Hope you're doing well and staying healthy. 
[Q] Please read the following sentence at a slow pace: Wishing you a wonderful weekend ahead. 
[A] Wishing you a wonderful weekend ahead. 
[Q] Please read the following sentence at a fast pace: It feels like forever since we last caught up. How have you been these days? 
[A]
generated_text: It feels like forever since we last caught up. How have you been these days. So, I hope you're doing well and staying healthy.
